# configurationsByApplication

**Instance Property**

The collection of apps available during an assessment, along with their associated configurations.

## Declaration

```swift
var configurationsByApplication: [AEAssessmentApplication : AEAssessmentParticipantConfiguration] { get }
```

## Discussion

Access this property to get a list of the currently allowed secondary apps and their individual configurations. Add apps to the list by calling the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration/setConfiguration(_:for:)] method. Remove them from the list by calling the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration/remove(_:)] method.

## Allowing access to other apps

- **setConfiguration(_:for:)**: Adds an app to the list of apps available during an assessment.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes the availability of a previously allowed app.
- **mainParticipantConfiguration**: The app-specific configuration for the app that invokes the assessment.
- **AEAssessmentApplication**: A representation of an app that users can access during an assessment.
- **AEAssessmentParticipantConfiguration**: Configuration information for an app that’s available during an assessment.
